languages.text: "Прячусь? Я? А ты верно ждал{mf||а}, что я брошусь навстречу? Соберу приветственную делегацию?"

traits.locale_text: "Прячусь? Я? А ты верно ждал{mf||а}, что я брошусь навстречу? Соберу приветственную делегацию?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"
languages.original_text: "Прячусь? Я? А ты верно ждал{mf||а}, что я брошусь навстречу? Соберу приветственную делегацию?"

traits.locale_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

traits.locale_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

traits.locale_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

traits.locale_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

traits.locale_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: 「隠れていると？私が？ああ、私が急いで挨拶に来るとでも期待していたのか？もしかしたら歓迎会を準備してるかもしれないと？」
languages.original_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"

traits.locale_text: 「隠れていると？私が？ああ、私が急いで挨拶に来るとでも期待していたのか？もしかしたら歓迎会を準備してるかもしれないと？」
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: “躲？我吗？噢，你是打算让我来迎接你吗？或许你可以组织一场欢迎会之类的？”
languages.original_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"

traits.locale_text: “躲？我吗？噢，你是打算让我来迎接你吗？或许你可以组织一场欢迎会之类的？”
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: « Me cacher, moi ? Vous pensiez peut-être que je m'empresserais de venir vous saluer ? Que je préparerais un comité d'accueil ? »
languages.original_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"

traits.locale_text: « Me cacher, moi ? Vous pensiez peut-être que je m'empresserais de venir vous saluer ? Que je préparerais un comité d'accueil ? »
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: «¿Esconderme? ¿Yo? No me dirás que esperabas que os recibiera en persona. ¿Querías un comité de bienvenida?».
languages.original_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Esconderme? ¿Yo? No me dirás que esperabas que os recibiera en persona. ¿Querías un comité de bienvenida?».
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: "Verstecken? Ich? Oh, hattet Ihr erwartet, ich würde zu Euch eilen und Euch begrüßen? Oder vielleicht ein Willkommenskomitee aufbieten?"
languages.original_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"

traits.locale_text: "Verstecken? Ich? Oh, hattet Ihr erwartet, ich würde zu Euch eilen und Euch begrüßen? Oder vielleicht ein Willkommenskomitee aufbieten?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker

languages.text: "Saklanmak mı? Ben mi? Seni karşılamak için koşuşturmamı mı bekliyordun? Karşılama komitesi de ister misin?"
languages.original_text: "Hiding? Me? Oh, were you expecting me to hurry forward to greet you? Organise a welcoming committee, perhaps?"

traits.locale_text: "Saklanmak mı? Ben mi? Hah, seni karşılamak için koşuşturmamı mı bekliyordun? Karşılama komitesi atamamı da ister misin?"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Speaker
